#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zY[i] <- 0
		zY[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fY[i] <- (alphaY / sY) * pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY - 1) * exp(-pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY))
		phi[i] <- -log(fY[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris NO2
	alphaY ~  dunif(0,10)
	sY ~ dunif(0,150)
}

data
list(y=c(298, 215, 290, 176, 210, 159, 162, 227, 223, 178, 221, 237, 186, 174, 253, 171, 98, 63, 67, 94, 157, 188, 151, 177, 152, 197, 128, 110, 127, 90, 140, 90, 75, 178, 143, 109, 84, 208, 185, 153, 112, 78, 109, 77, 107, 154, 297, 282, 202, 166, 170, 145, 125, 120, 126, 131, 157, 155, 153, 175, 210, 212, 113, 82, 100, 90, 98, 89, 171, 145, 265, 332, 331, 252, 242, 165, 197, 116, 110, 131, 141, 224, 200, 237, 255, 199, 275, 259, 214, 251, 187, 182, 153, 184, 124, 250, 211, 233, 250, 186, 235, 148, 125, 92, 78, 88, 107, 147, 89, 94, 65, 69, 83, 99, 80, 117, 133, 159, 139, 175, 167, 252, 255, 160, 177, 110, 87, 85, 93, 208, 115, 138, 159, 127, 104, 133, 97, 59, 78, 88, 133, 120, 137, 150, 132, 114, 107, 138, 142, 94, 129, 96, 121, 94, 118, 184, 175, 108, 162, 184, 155, 98, 113, 115, 98, 110, 127, 166, 160, 228, 133, 160, 136, 95, 92, 106, 99, 137, 232, 156, 160, 144, 118, 146, 125, 110, 93, 105, 153, 122, 145, 187, 158, 171, 117, 134, 125, 93, 79, 74, 89, 115, 121, 178, 115, 149, 148, 130, 118, 83, 81, 85, 85, 107, 161, 133, 136, 119, 82, 137, 126, 77, 95, 85, 86, 108, 108, 156, 137, 146, 112, 96, 103, 82, 70, 57, 97, 98, 134, 118, 110, 99, 93, 95, 72, 76, 70, 61, 83, 113, 96, 122, 111, 86, 81, 77, 78, 60, 75, 72, 98, 114, 118, 157, 94, 108, 103, 105, 91, 63, 66, 92, 86, 109, 118, 122, 133, 119, 109, 100, 107, 101, 66, 87, 63, 82, 110, 106, 113, 97, 85, 82, 102, 90, 84, 78, 73, 91, 97, 134, 122, 94, 66, 88, 66, 85, 72, 79, 78, 99, 117, 130, 119, 98, 83, 93, 85, 70, 57, 75, 68, 68, 91, 111, 99, 90, 77, 73, 84, 72, 67, 62, 105, 62, 96, 105, 93, 80, 66, 66, 66, 59, 60, 57, 55, 52, 104, 131, 86, 72, 62, 77, 64, 58, 59, 63, 47, 62, 62, 102, 91, 68, 59, 53, 54, 35, 43, 40, 41, 67, 72, 68, 58, 67, 54, 59, 58, 50, 57, 46, 48, 53, 70, 105), N=384)

list(alphaY = 2.58, sY = 110.64)
list(alphaY = 1.16, sY = 135.16)
list(alphaY = 2.03, sY = 129.13)
list(alphaY = 2.67, sY = 119.94)
list(alphaY = 1.94, sY = 123.24)
